forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 76, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. South wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. South southeast wind 3 to 7 mph. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 81, with temperatures falling to around 77 in the afternoon. South wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 2am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. East wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 4am, then a chance of rain showers and patchy fog. Mostly cloudy. Low around 44, with temperatures rising to around 46 overnight. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
